rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {CPE1001, CSE1202, FIT1002, FIT1040, FIT1051, GCO1811} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Unit was previously coded {CSE1203, FIT1007, GCO1812}

description: The emphasis in this unit is on the application of fundamental programming concepts using an object-oriented programming language. It also introduces more advanced object-oriented programming topics such as inheritance and polymorphism. It gives students a deeper understanding of programming and gives more practical skills in designing, building and testing larger computer programs, including ones having graphical user interfaces, and utilising file I/O.
